TextEng: <StartAction>How do I create a focus crystal?</Start>
What do I care? Stop bothering me.
Text: 내가 왜 신경 써야 해? 귀찮게 하지 마.

TextEng: I just want out of here, that's all.
Text: 난 그냥 여기서 나가고 싶을 뿐이야.

TextEng: I'll say whatever I like, girl.
Text: 내가 하고 싶은 말 하는 거야, 아가씨.

TextEng: Probably not. It looks pretty grim.
Text: 아마 아닐 거야. 상황이 꽤 안 좋아 보여.

TextEng: Ayala says he just needs some herbs and he'll recover.
Text: 아얄라가 약초만 있으면 회복할 거라고 했어.

TextEng: Knock it off, both of you.
Take her along? As what? Monster bait?
He should be fine. Don't worry about it.
<StartAction>Tell the dog where Bethsheva buried the item.</Start>
<StartAction>Ask the dog for any useful information it might have.</Start>
<StartAction>Ask the dog for information on the kobolds' passing.</Start>
I have no choice. I need to find those kobolds.
Text: 선택의 여지가 없어. 코볼트들을 찾아야 해.

TextEng: Do you have anything to eat around here?
Actually, I came here looking for Helmthorn berries. Do you still have some?
Text: 사실 투구가시 열매를 찾으러 왔어. 아직 가지고 있어?

TextEng: It was nothing more than my duty.
So... just how grateful are you?
It took a lot of effort to rescue you, that's why.
Text: 널 구출하는 데 노력이 많이 들었거든.

TextEng: I'm hungry. Are my efforts worth a good meal?
Text: 배고픈데, 내 노력이 좋은 식사 대접 받을 가치는 있지?

TextEng: Would the fair damsel deign to reward her rescuer with a simple kiss?
Text: 아름다운 아가씨가 구출자에게 간단한 키스로 보답해줄까?

TextEng: You're a pretty girl. Surely I don't have to spell it out for you.
Text: 넌 예쁜 아가씨잖아. 확실히 설명할 필요는 없겠지.

TextEng: I want a reward, of course. You must have some coin on you.
Text: 당연히 보상을 원하지. 돈이 좀 있잖아.

TextEng: They'll have to do. Hand them over.
I can think of another way for a pretty girl like you to reward me...
Text: 널 같은 예쁜 아가씨가 나한테 보답할 다른 방법이 떠오르는데...

TextEng: I actually need some Helmthorn berries. The herbalist said you might have some.
Text: 사실 투구가시 열매가 좀 필요해. 약초상이 네가 가지고 있을 거라고 했어.

TextEng: I suppose with everyone so distracted, robbing you will be easy.
Text: 모두가 정신없으니까, 널 털기 쉬울 것 같네.

TextEng: Yes, I am. Ha ha! Funny, isn't it?
Not at all. I could use a few extra coins.
Text: 전혀. 동전 몇 닢은 벌 수 있을 것 같은데.

TextEng: Oh, forget it. You probably don't have anything worth taking.
Text: 아, 됐어. 넌 아마 뺏을 만한 것도 없을 거야.

TextEng: The whole town's been attacked, it seems.
Do you know anything else about kobolds?
Why do you think the kobolds attacked?
Youngster? I'm probably older than you are.
Text: 젊은이? 난 아마 너보다 나이가 많을걸.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Send your mind out to touch the bear's mind.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Coup-de-grace]</Start> I will put you out of your misery, bear.  It's for the best.
Text: <StartAction>[급소 공격]</Start> 곰아, 고통에서 해방시켜 줄게. 이게 최선이야.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Remove the arrow and cleanse the wound.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Send your mind out to touch the bear's mind.]</Start>
<StartAction>Ask her about the secret she buried.</Start>
<StartAction>Ask the wolf for any useful information it might have.</Start>
<StartAction>Ask her if you can help find her a mate.</Start>
Text: <StartAction>짝을 찾는 걸 도와줄 수 있는지 물어봅니다.</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>Ask the wolf for information on the kobolds' passing.</Start>
Be quiet, I don't know if there are more kobolds around here.
Text: 조용히 해. 여기 코볼트가 더 있을지 모르겠어.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Coup de gras]</Start> Widows are much easier to manipulate. See you in hell.
Text: <StartAction>[치명타]</Start> 과부가 조종하기 훨씬 쉽지. 지옥에서 보자고.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Heal]</Start> Hold still; let me treat you with this healing kit.
Text: <StartCheck>[치료]</Start> 가만히 있어. 이 치료 도구로 치료해 줄게.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Lay on Hands]</Start> Hold still; let me treat you.
<StartAction>[Use a spell or ability to Cure Adam.]</Start> Hold still, let me treat you.
Text: <StartAction>[아담을 치료할 주문이나 능력을 사용한다.]</Start> 가만히 있어. 치료해 줄게.

TextEng: Take this healing potion; you look like you need it more than I.
Text: 이 치유 물약을 받아. 나보다 네가 더 필요해 보이니까.

TextEng: I'll see what I can do...
The kobold will release your child in exchange for a gem, do you have any?
Text: 코볼트가 보석과 교환하면 아이를 풀어준대. 보석 있어?

TextEng: No, I think I will keep the child.
I think I will keep him.
Fine. Take your babe. He sure smells awful anyways.
Text: 좋아. 네 아기 가져가. 냄새도 지독하고.

TextEng: I want to take him to his mother.
No, you might want to continue cowering in here for a while.
Text: 아니, 여기서 좀 더 웅크리고 있는 게 좋을 거야.

TextEng: I want to ask you some questions.
Sorry, can I fix the door or pay you for the damage?
Besides the attack, what has happened recently?
Text: 공격 말고, 최근에 무슨 일이 있었어?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade - Lie]</Start>So have you heard about the new Kobold Defense Tax?
Maybe I don't need directions after all.
Text: 길 안내는 필요 없을 것 같네.

TextEng: Where would I find the mayor?
I don't need any more directions.
Text: 더 이상 길 안내는 필요 없어.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade - Intimidate]</Start> Not for you, unless I see some gold!
Text: <StartCheck>[설득 - 위협]</Start> 네겐 아니지, 금화를 보지 않는 한!

TextEng: Why didn't you come out and help drive off the attack?
Text: 왜 나와서 공격을 막는 걸 도와주지 않았어?

TextEng: Hello, rat. Where did you come from?
<StartAction>[Grab Becka and crawl into the darkness to see where it leads...]</Start>
Text: <StartAction>[베카를 잡고 어둠 속으로 기어들어가 어디로 이어지는지 본다...]</Start>

TextEng: You have the wrong person. Goodbye.
And I would have won that fight, if your friends hadn't interfered.
Text: 네 친구들이 끼어들지만 않았어도 내가 그 싸움에서 이겼을 거야.

TextEng: You insulted my teacher! Drogan's powers deserve your respect.
Text: 넌 내 스승을 모욕했어! 드로건의 능력은 존중받아 마땅해.

TextEng: You and your friends were bragging about your cruelty to animals. It was the least you deserved.
Text: 너랑 네 친구들은 동물을 학대한 걸 자랑했어. 그 정도 대가는 당연하지.

TextEng: You insulted my god in public! What else was I supposed to do?
Text: 공개적으로 내 신을 모욕했잖아! 달리 어떻게 하길 원했어?

TextEng: You are the one that made fun of my music! I ought to teach you a lesson in manners.
Text: 내 음악을 비웃은 건 너잖아! 예의를 가르쳐 줘야겠어.

TextEng: That's right, you cowardly dog! I bested you then and could take you again!
Text: 맞아, 이 겁쟁이 개 같은 놈아! 그때도 이겼고 지금도 이길 수 있어!

TextEng: He's right. It was all good spirited humor.
No. I have never been so insulted.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> No, this brute is a violent, evil man. You should get rid of him.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 아니야, 이 짐승은 폭력적이고 사악한 놈이야. 쫓아내야 해.

TextEng: I suppose you could call it that.
No, you have mistaken me. I am one of Drogan's pupils.
Text: 아니야, 날 잘못 알았어. 난 드로건의 제자 중 한 명이야.

TextEng: Run Shadow Hart, hunters are near.
Text: 도망가, 그림자 숫사슴. 사냥꾼들이 가까이 있어.

TextEng: Be calm. I am a friend.
May I ask you some questions?
That's all the questions I have.
<StartAction>[Calmly approach the stag, and touch its forehead.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Calmly approach the stag, then attack it.]</Start>
You are being hunted, Shadow Hart. You must flee these lands.
Text: 너는 사냥당하고 있어, 그림자 숫사슴. 이 땅에서 도망쳐야 해.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Throw a few crumbs of food to the bats.]</Start>

Text: 무엇이 네 안식을 방해하는 거야, 영혼이여?

TextEng: May I ask you some questions?
I have too much to do already. Sorry.
Text: 이미 할 일이 너무 많아. 미안해.

TextEng: What does the sword look like?
Do you want me to find it?
Open the door now, or I'll break it down and kill you all.
Text: 당장 문 열어, 안 그러면 부수고 들어가서 다 죽일 거야.

TextEng: Who is in charge in there?
I am <FullName> and I would speak with your leader.
I am not a gnoll. I am <FirstName> and I just want to talk.
Text: 나는 놀이 아니야. <FirstName>이고 그냥 얘기하고 싶을 뿐이야.

TextEng: Skeletons do not talk, stupid kobold!
Text: 해골은 말 안 해, 멍청한 코볼트야!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Just open the door and you will see that I am no enemy.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 그냥 문 열어, 내가 적이 아니란 걸 알 거야.

TextEng: How stupid are you? Just open the damn door!
Text: 너 얼마나 멍청한 거야? 그냥 문 열어!

TextEng: If I was a talking spider, I would web the door and wait for you to come out for food.
Text: 내가 말하는 거미였으면, 문에 거미줄 치고 너희가 먹을 것 찾으러 나올 때까지 기다렸겠지.

TextEng: I am not a spider either. I am not here to kill you.
Text: 나는 거미도 아니야. 너희를 죽이러 온 게 아니라고.

TextEng: <StartAction>Ask the bear about the gnoll caves.</Start>
<StartAction>Put the poor creature out of its misery.</Start>
What do you need magic for?
Is there some other way to pay?
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Could you not allow me to give you something later?
Would you accept a song, instead?
I am not casting a spell on you!
You want me to cast a spell on you?
What do you need magic for?
Is there some other way to pay?
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Could you not allow me to give you something later?
Would you accept a song, instead?
I am not casting a spell on you!
You want me to cast a spell on you?
Place the Rod of Ruler in the slot.
Insert the stone key into the keyhole.
Insert the stone key into the keyhole.
<StartAction>[Coup de grace]</Start> You will be much easier to rob once you're dead.
<StartCheck>[Heal]</Start> Hold still; let me treat you with this healing kit.
Text: <StartCheck>[치료]</Start> 가만히 있어. 치료용 키트로 치료해 줄게.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Lay on Hands]</Start> Hold still; let me treat you.
<StartAction>[Use a spell or ability to cure him.]</Start> Let me heal you.
You were just dying. Do you really want to face that again?
Text: 방금 죽어가고 있었잖아. 정말 다시 그걸 겪고 싶어?

TextEng: Aren't you a little old for this?
Text: 이 일 하기엔 좀 늙지 않았어?

TextEng: Well - I just saw a  bunch of merchants had been killed on their way here.
Text: 음 - 상인 무리가 여기 오는 길에 살해당했어.

TextEng: If you wish. It doesn't bother me.
Don't you think you should stay sharp, just in case?
Text: 만약을 위해 정신 바짝 차려야 하지 않을까?

TextEng: Drink? Is that all you can think about?
Do you have any advice for me?
Do you know anything about these stingers?
How would you like to join me to look for the guide?
Just what do you do around here, anyway?
And just where do you get your goods?
I'd like to see what you have for sale.
I'll join you, if you don't mind.
No need. I'm just happy you're unharmed.
Gold sounds fine, or something better if you have it.
Text: 금화면 좋아, 더 좋은 게 있으면 그것도 괜찮고.

TextEng: Then forget it. It's not worth my time.
Cough up something better or I kill you here, fool!
Text: 더 나은 걸 내놔, 안 그러면 여기서 죽일 거야, 멍청이!

TextEng: Oh, never mind. This isn't worth my time.
Keep it. The gold will have to do.
I wouldn't have bothered if you weren't needed to guide the caravan.
Text: 네가 캐러밴을 안내해야 하는 게 아니었으면 이렇게까지 안 했어.

TextEng: What was I supposed to do again?
I would like to make a purchase.
<StartCheck>[Persuade - Intimidate]</Start> Your life is on the line here too. Refuse to help me and death might come swifter than you expect.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득 - 위협]</Start> 네 목숨도 걸려 있어. 날 돕기를 거부하면 죽음이 예상보다 빨리 올 수도 있어.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Don't you think I should have free access to anything that could help us?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 우리를 도울 수 있는 건 뭐든 무료로 쓸 수 있게 해줘야 하지 않아?

TextEng: Should you not allow me full, free access to your wares, then?
Text: 그럼 네 물건들을 완전히 무료로 쓸 수 있게 해줘야 하는 거 아니야?

TextEng: I have some things to do.
What kind of problems did you have with them?
I would like to make a purchase.
Why don't you come with me?
What do you know about the Bedine?
How do you kill a mummy?
Do you have any advice for me?
I'd like to see what you have for sale.
Why aren't you doing it? You're the guide.
Text: 왜 네가 안 해? 넌 안내인이잖아.

TextEng: Do you know why they stay here?
Why would they curse all other Bedine?
What happens if you try to enter the oasis?
We have permission to use the water.
The Bedine have mostly been slaughtered. <StartAction>[Tell him about the undead.]</Start>
I want to ask you some questions.
<StartAction>Climb the statue and grab the rubies.</Start>
Tell me where the treasure is.
Help me fight the other intruders.
You are not doing a very good job.
Text: 별로 잘하고 있는 것 같지 않은데.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Insight]</Start> Your master summoned me to gather his belongings.
Text: <StartCheck>[통찰]</Start> 네 주인이 그의 소지품을 가져오라고 날 소환했어.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> The master is in a hurry and wants me to take something off his body.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 주인이 서두르고 있어서 몸에서 뭔가를 가져가길 원하셔.

TextEng: Silent meditation!?! There's no flesh on his body.
Wisdom doesn't enter into it. He's dead I tell you.
<StartAction>[Hold out a piece of quartz.]</Start> Let us exchange shiny rocks.
<StartCheck>[Persuade - Intimidate]</Start> Give me the diamond or I crush your skull!
Text: <StartCheck>[설득 - 위협]</Start> 다이아몬드 내놔, 안 그럼 네 머리통 부셔버린다!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Please give me the rock. I need it.
<StartAction>Take the fairy dust from the urn.</Start>
<StartAction>Take the slaad tongue from the urn (Number of tongues in the urn: <CUSTOM33004>).</Start>
Text: <StartAction>단지에서 슬라드 혀를 꺼냅니다 (단지 안의 혀 개수: <CUSTOM33004>).</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>Take the slaad tongue from the urn (Number of tongues in the urn: <CUSTOM30004>).</Start>
Text: <StartAction>단지에서 슬라드 혀를 꺼냅니다 (단지 안의 혀 개수: <CUSTOM30004>).</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>Take the dragon's blood  from the urn.</Start>
<StartAction>Take the belladonna root from the urn (Number of roots in the urn: <CUSTOM33002>).</Start>
Text: <StartAction>단지에서 벨라도나 뿌리를 꺼냅니다 (단지 안의 뿌리 개수: <CUSTOM33002>).</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>Take the belladonna root from the urn (Number of roots in the urn: <CUSTOM30002>).</Start>
Text: <StartAction>단지에서 벨라도나 뿌리를 꺼냅니다 (단지 안의 뿌리 개수: <CUSTOM30002>).</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>Take the ruby from the urn (Number of rubies in the urn: <CUSTOM33001>).</Start>
<StartAction>Take the ruby from the urn (Number of rubies in the urn: <CUSTOM30001>).</Start>
<StartAction>Place some fairy dust inside the urn.</Start>
<StartAction>Place a slaad tongue inside the urn.</Start>
<StartAction>Place a slaad tongue inside the urn.</Start>
<StartAction>Place some dragon's blood inside the urn.</Start>
<StartAction>Place a belladonna root inside the urn.</Start>
<StartAction>Place a belladonna root inside the urn.</Start>
I am not interested in your offer. I am here to kill you.
How often will you help me?
How do I use this crystal?
How do you speak to my mind?
Never mind my name, witch! I am going to kill you!
Forget Drogan. My name is <FirstName>, and I have a proposal for you.
Text: 드로건은 잊어. 내 이름은 <FirstName>이고, 제안이 있어.

TextEng: I am <FirstName>, and I am here to stop you.
Can I ask you some questions?
What can you tell me about these Ao worshippers?
Text: 에이오 숭배자들에 대해 뭘 알려줄 수 있어?

TextEng: Don't I get paid for helping your caravan get here?
Text: 네 캐러밴 여기까지 오는 거 도와줬으면 보수를 받아야 하는 거 아냐?

TextEng: <StartAction>Ask the leopard for any useful information it might have.</Start>
<StartAction>Ask the leopard for information about his mistress.</Start>
<StartHighlight>[Cast Charm]</Start> You will give me your gift.
<StartHighlight>[Use a healing potion.]</Start> This should make it all better. It contains some of my holy blood.
Text: <StartHighlight>[치유 물약을 사용합니다.]</Start> 이걸로 나아질 거야. 내 성스러운 피가 담겨 있어.

TextEng: <StartHighlight>[Use a healing kit.]</Start> This should make it all better. My holy powers are bound into these bandages.
Text: <StartHighlight>[치유 도구를 사용합니다.]</Start> 이걸로 나아질 거야. 내 성스러운 힘이 이 붕대에 깃들어 있어.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade - Intimidate]</Start> Give me your gift or I shall smite you with my holy wrath.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득 - 위협]</Start> 선물 내놔, 안 그럼 내 성스러운 분노로 응징하겠어.

TextEng: I am not Ao! And you should not wound yourself anymore.
<StartHighlight>[Cast Charm]</Start> You will give me your gift.
<StartCheck>[Persuade - Intimidate]</Start> Give me your gift or I shall smite you with my holy wrath.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득 - 위협]</Start> 선물 내놔, 안 그럼 내 성스러운 분노로 응징하겠어.

TextEng: Two gifts is better than one. Goodbye.
Text: 선물 두 개가 하나보다 낫지. 안녕.

TextEng: Since you show true understanding of my apathy, I will take your gift.
Text: 네 무관심에 대한 진정한 이해를 보여주니, 네 선물을 받아주지.

TextEng: I will listen to them first.
<StartAction>[Take the bottle, since no-one who cares can see you.]</Start>
<StartCheck>[Dexterity]</Start> <StartAction>[Swipe the bottle when no-one is looking.]</Start>
<StartCheck>[Pick Pocket]</Start> <StartAction>[Swipe the bottle when no-one is looking.]</Start>
We will break him in time. Once we learn all the secrets of Undermountain, the Valsharess's army will march through its halls and descend upon Waterdeep like -
Text: 시간이 지나면 그를 굴복시킬 거다. 언더마운틴의 모든 비밀을 알아내면, 발샤레스의 군대가 그 홀을 행진해서 워터딥을 덮칠 거야-

TextEng: Then go over there and search the area, fool! Do I need to tell you everything?
Text: 그럼 거기 가서 수색해, 멍청아! 뭐든 다 일일이 말해줘야 하냐?

TextEng: If the portal is opened, more drow will come through. I don't want that; I can barely stand you.
Text: 차원문이 열리면 드로우가 더 나올 테지. 난 그거 원하지 않지. 너 하나도 견디기 힘들거든.

TextEng: The last thing I need is another dark elf. I'll just keep my secret all to myself.
Text: 다크 엘프가 더 오는건 딱 질색이야. 내 비밀은 그냥 나 혼만 딱 알고 있을거야.

TextEng: "I hope you don't expect me to help you."
Text: 내가 널 도와줄 거라고 기대하진 마.

TextEng: "I don't need reinforcements. I'm going on ahead."
"We were attacked by creatures from the Underdark."
"I'd like to buy some crafting material."
"Could you teach me to make weapons and armor?"
Text: "무기랑 갑옷 만드는 법을 가르쳐 줄 수 있어?"

TextEng: "I just want to change the way my equipment looks."
"Do you know how to make magical items?"
"How do I find materials to make into weapons or armor?"
"I want to buy some crafting material."
<StartAction>[Ignore Sobrey and put a gold piece on the pedestal.]</Start>
"The pedestal has a sense of humor?"
"I don't have time for this. Durnan said you had something for me."
Text: "이럴 시간 없어. 더난이 네가 뭔가 갖고 있다고 했는데."

TextEng: "What kind of god do you follow?"
"Let me see what items you have."
"If they're stupid enough to rush off, then they got what they deserved."
"Do you have anything else I could use?"
"If I come across their bodies, I'll be sure to try and help them."
"I want to ask you some questions."
"Do you know anything about these attacks?"
"He's a foolish man to pass up an opportunity like that."
"Isn't he a little old for you?"
"Durnan said you have something for me."
Focus on the images of the glittering objects.
Focus on the images of death and decay.
<StartAction>[Insert the Activation Stone into the slot.]</Start>
Close the lid and let her rest in peace.
Ignore Linu and open the sarcophagus.
"Don't you want to destroy this evil?"
"Don't worry - I can handle whatever's inside here!"
Text: 걱정 마. 안에 뭐가 있든 처리할 수 있어!

TextEng: Focus on the less pleasant creatures.
<StartCheck>[Set Trap DC: 25]</Start> Try to channel the portal's energy towards living beings.
Text: <StartCheck>[함정 설치 난이도: 25]</Start> <StartAction>차원문의 에너지를 생명체 쪽으로 유도해봅니다.</Start>

TextEng: "I don't have time for this. Just go."
"Time to squash some bugs. Bye-bye, freak!"
"I want to ask you some questions."
"Is there some kind of reward for freeing you?"
"But I want to fight the drow!"
Please send a request my party members to join me here.
No, I want to stick around here awhile.
I would like to jump to the PC Hero.
Yes, please teleport me back to where I last died.
Text: 응, 내가 마지막으로 죽었던 곳으로 순간이동시켜 줘.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Leave the table alone and walk away.]</Start>
<StartCheck>[Spellcraft]</Start><StartAction> [Mix some ingredients together and see what happens.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Place the Ancient Oak Branch in the Vine Covered Basin.]</Start>
Text: <StartAction>[덩굴로 덮인 분지에 고대 떡갈나무 가지를 놓습니다.]</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>[Nothing you do seems to affect the basin at the moment.]</Start>
Text: <StartAction>[지금은 분지에 뭘 해도 아무 일도 일어나지 않는 것 같습니다.]</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>Place the other ear into the remaining hole.</Start>
<StartAction>Place an ear into one of the holes.</Start>
<StartAction>Catch the light along the crystal's length.</Start>
<StartAction>Catch the light along the crystal's width.</Start>
<StartAction>Catch the light along the crystal's height.</Start>
<StartAction>Catch the light along the crystal's length.</Start>
<StartAction>Catch the light along the crystal's width.</Start>
<StartAction>Catch the light along the crystal's height.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the images of the glittering objects.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the images of death and decay.</Start>
"The followers of Eilistraee know how to fight, and they'll prove it right now!"
Text: 에일리스트레이 신도들은 싸울 줄 알아. 지금 당장 증명해줄 거야!

TextEng: "Yeah. Get rid of these pacifists before they fail us in battle."
Text: 그래. 전투에서 쓸모없어지기 전에 이 평화주의자들부터 제거해.

TextEng: "This stupid in-fighting only makes our defeat more likely."
Text: 이런 멍청한 내분은 우리 패배만 더 확실하게 만들 뿐이야.

TextEng: "You don't have many allies... you better learn to treat them better."
Text: 동료가 많지도 않은데... 좀 더 잘 대해주는 법을 배워야 할걸.

TextEng: "Come on, svirf... drink up. I want to see a new record!"
Text: 어이, 스버프... 마셔. 신기록 세는 거 보고 싶어!

TextEng: <StartAction>Intimidate</Start> "I won't let this svirf drink himself to death!"
Text: <StartAction>위협</Start> 이 스버프가 술 마시다 죽게 내버려둘 수 없어!

TextEng: <StartAction>Persuade</Start> "That's enough. No sense wasting good ale on a servant."
Text: <StartAction>설득합니다.</Start> 그만해. 좋은 술을 하인한테 낭비할 필요 없어.

TextEng: "I want to ask you some questions."
"Can you tell me about the army of the Valsharess?"
"Can't we just kill them before they join her?"
Text: "그들이 합류하기 전에 그냥 죽이면 안 돼?"

TextEng: "I could go negotiate with the Zorvak'Mur Elder Brain."
Text: "조르박무르 엘더 브레인과 협상하러 갈 수 있어."

TextEng: "I'm looking for allies against the Valsharess."
"I'd like to ask you some questions."
"What can you tell me about this camp?"
Text: "이 야영지에 대해 뭘 말해줄 수 있어?"

TextEng: "I want to ask you something else."
"Good to see you're making the most of this time."
Text: "이 시간을 최대한 활용하고 있는 모습이 보기 좋네."

TextEng: "If you do anything to betray this camp..."
"What do you know about the Valsharess?"
"They took you in, and now you revel in their destruction?"
Text: "그들이 널 받아줬는데, 이제 그들의 파멸을 즐기는 거야?"

TextEng: "Can you open the gates for me?"
"What do you know about the illithid?"
"Tell me about the illithid mind powers."
"I can look after myself. Open the gate."
Text: "난 스스로를 돌볼 수 있어. 문을 열어."

TextEng: "I'll be careful. Please open the gate."
"Why are you so worried about protecting this gate?"
Text: "왜 이 문을 지키는 데 그렇게 신경 써?"

TextEng: "I want to ask you some questions."
"Do you know anything about the Valsharess?"
"What do you know about the Seer?"
"Do you have any advice for stopping the Valsharess?"
Text: "발샤레스를 막을 조언 좀 해줄 수 있어?"

TextEng: "Why is a High Wizard out here hawking his wares?"
"I want to ask you something else."
"I'm trying to save you all - can't you just give me the items?"
Text: "모두를 구하려고 하는데, 그냥 아이템 줄 수는 없어?"

TextEng: "Zesyyr said to show you this ring."
"She wouldn't even be Matron if it wasn't for me!"
Text: "내가 없었으면 그녀는 대모도 못 됐을 거야!"

TextEng: "I'm the one who warned her about Zesyyr!"
"Not yet - I am still organizing our defensive strategies."
Text: 아직이야. 아직 방어 전략을 짜고 있어.

TextEng: "Yes - I believe we are ready for their onslaught now."
"I don't need you to tell me how to run this battle!"
Text: 전투를 어떻게 치를지 네가 말해 줄 필요 없어!

TextEng: "I want to ask you some questions."
"What do you know about the Valsharess?"
"What do you have against the followers of Eilistraee?"
"I'll tell her what a fine job you are doing."
"Maybe you'd get better results if you weren't so hard on them."
Text: "그들에게 그렇게 가혹하게 굴지 않으면 더 나은 결과를 얻을 수 있을 거야."

TextEng: "These troops are pathetic! What kind of training are you giving them?"
Text: "이 병사들은 형편없어! 대체 무슨 훈련을 시키는 거야?"

TextEng: "I came to warn you. Zesyyr wants the Matron dead."
"Can't she? She wanted me to kill you."
Text: "못 할 게 뭐야? 그녀가 날 보내서 당신을 죽이라고 했어."

TextEng: "I've decided Zesyyr should rule!" <StartAction>Attack the Matron.</Start>
"She gave me her ring to get me past the guards."
<StartAction>Intimidate</Start> "Come up with something more, or I'll finish the job Zesyyr sent me to do!"
Text: <StartAction>위협</Start> "더 줄 게 없으면, 제시르가 시킨 일을 끝내버리겠어!"

TextEng: <StartAction>Persuade</Start> "I think I deserve a little more than that."
"Zesyyr sent me to kill you!" <StartAction>Attack the Matron.</Start>
Text: 제시르가 날 보내서 널 죽이라고 했어! <StartAction>대모를 공격한다.</Start>

TextEng: "My name is <FullName>. I work for the Seer."
<StartAction>Bluff</Start> "I'll tell people your mother escaped. Then they won't support you."
Text: <StartAction>허세</Start> 네 어미가 탈출했다고 소문 낼 거야. 그럼 아무도 널 지지 안 할걸.

TextEng: <StartAction>Intimidate</Start> "Pay up, or you'll suffer the same fate as your mother!"
Text: <StartAction>위협</Start> 돈 내, 안 그럼 네 어미랑 똑같은 운명 맞을 거야!

TextEng: <StartAction>Persuade</Start> "Now you know how useful I can be."
Text: <StartAction>설득</Start> 내가 얼마나 쓸모 있는지 이제 알았지?

TextEng: "Let me see what you have for sale."
"Do you know anything about a drow called the Valsharess?"
Text: 발샤레스라는 드로우에 대해 아는 거 있어?

TextEng: "Why will you trade with me when the others won't?"
Text: 다른 이들은 안 그러는데 넌 왜 나랑 거래해?

TextEng: "I need to speak to the Elder Brain."
"I must speak with the Elder Brain."
"I've come to speak about the Valsharess."
"You can't keep me out if you're dead!" <StartAction>Attack the illithid.</Start>
"I want to bet on an upcoming fight."
"I want to ask you some questions."
"I want my thrall released from the pits."
"I might be interested in a wager."
"I've decided I don't want to place a wager."
"Forget it. Just throw her in there."
"Fine. Here's 100 gold. Give her some equipment."
"Quiet, thrall! I'm the master here, remember?"
Text: "조용히 해, 노예! 여기선 내가 주인이야, 알겠어?"

TextEng: "Shut up, thrall. You will learn respect!"
"I bet I can make some money off you in the pits."
Text: 투기장에 넣으면 돈 벌 수 있을 것 같은데.

TextEng: "I'm going to give you your freedom."
"You have to deliver a message to one of my allies, thrall."
Text: 내 동료 중 한 명에게 전갈을 전해야 해, 노예.

TextEng: <StartAction>Lie</Start> "Yes. If you disobey me you'll suffer a horrible, painful death."
Text: <StartAction>거짓말</Start> 그래. 명령 어기면 끔찍하고 고통스러운 죽음을 맞을 거야.

TextEng: <StartAction>Give her a fake message and directions to find the Seer.</Start>
Text: <StartAction>가짜 전갈을 주고 선견자를 찾는 길을 알려줍니다.</Start>

TextEng: "Would you rather be a thrall to the illithid?"
<StartAction>[Use Open Lock Skill]</Start> Forget the patterns and try to open the lock.
Text: <StartAction>[자물쇠 따기 기술 사용]</Start> <StartAction>패턴 무시하고 자물쇠를 따봅니다.</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>[Use Intelligence]</Start> Attempt to focus on the patterns.
Try to form the image of the number 19.
Try to form the image of the number 17.
Try to form the image of the number 15.
Try to form an image of the number 11.
<StartAction>[Use Open Lock Skill]</Start> Forget the patterns and try to open the lock.
Text: <StartAction>[자물쇠 따기 기술 사용]</Start> <StartAction>패턴 무시하고 자물쇠를 따봅니다.</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>[Use Intelligence]</Start> Attempt to focus on the patterns.
Try to form the image of the number 108.
Try to form the image of the number 98.
Try to form the image of the number 96.
Try to form an image of the number 49.
<StartAction>[Use Open Lock Skill]</Start> Forget the patterns and try to open the lock.
Text: <StartAction>[자물쇠 따기 기술 사용]</Start> <StartAction>패턴 무시하고 자물쇠를 따봅니다.</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>[Use Intelligence]</Start> Attempt to focus on the patterns.
Try to form the image of the number 21.
Try to form the image of the number 36.
Try to form an image of the number 30.
Try to form the image of the number 34.
<StartAction>[Use Open Lock Skill]</Start> Forget the patterns and try to open the lock.
Text: <StartAction>[자물쇠 따기 기술 사용]</Start> <StartAction>패턴 무시하고 자물쇠를 따봅니다.</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>[Use Intelligence]</Start> Attempt to focus on the patterns.
Try to form the image of the number 4.
Try to form the image of the number 3.
Try to form the image of the number 2.
Try to form an image of the number 1.
"Who are you? What is this place?"
"You're not a thrall. Why do you serve the illithid?"
"I go where I want, when I want."
"No duergar lackey is going to push me around!"
Text: "듀에르가 개 따위가 날 밀어붙일 순 없어!"

TextEng: "I want to see the thrall I sent to the pits."
'I think you need to die now."
"That's horrible! How can you serve such monsters!"
Text: "끔찍해! 어떻게 그런 괴물들을 섬길 수 있어!"

TextEng: "Sounds like you've got a good set up here."
"I want to ask you some questions."
"I don't see any illithid in here."
"Actually, I'm trying to get access to the Elder Brain."
"I want to ask you something else."
"I want to ask you some questions."
"I don't see any illithid in here."
"Actually, I'm trying to get access to the Elder Brain."
"Yes. I'm here to buy some thralls."
"What is this? Some kind of trick!"
"What's going on here? Who are you?"
"A dream? What are you talking about?"
"I've come to purchase thralls from your auctions."
"I guess if that's the only way in..." <StartAction>Remove your helm.</Start>
<StartAction>Intimidate</Start> "I'm here to buy thralls. Step aside, or I'll see you are added to the next auction."
Text: <StartAction>위협</Start> 노예 사러 왔어. 비켜, 안 그럼 다음 경매에 네가 올라가게 해주지.

TextEng: "I am here to buy thralls, not become one. The helm stays on."
Text: 노예를 사러 온 거지 노예가 되러 온 게 아냐. 투구는 안 벗어.
"조용히 해! 난 노예들한테 대답 안 해."

TextEng: "The warden is dead. I killed him myself."
"I don't serve anyone - but I kill everyone!" <StartAction>Attack the thralls.</Start>
Text: "난 누구도 섬기지 않아 - 하지만 모두를 죽이지!""" <StartAction>노예들을 공격한다.</Start>"

TextEng: "Hold on - I have some questions for you."
"It doesn't matter. Go fight for your freedom."
"That's right. I can't let you go yet."
"Wait! If you escape now the whole city will go hostile."
Text: "기다려! 지금 탈출하면 도시 전체가 적대적으로 변할 거야."

TextEng: "Just wait a bit. Just until I get to the Elder Brain."
Text: "조금만 기다려. 내가 엘더 브레인에 도착할 때까지만."

TextEng: "You're right. Go now, before it's too late. Hurry."
Text: "네 말이 맞아. 지금 가, 너무 늦기 전에. 서둘러."

TextEng: <StartAction>Intimidate</Start> "Either give me some time, or I'll kill you all now!"
Text: <StartAction>위협</Start> "시간을 줘, 아니면 지금 당장 다 죽일 거야!"

TextEng: <StartAction>Bluff</Start> "I'm going to poison the Elder Brain, crippling all the illithid."
Text: <StartAction>허세</Start> "엘더 브레인을 독살해서 일리시드를 전부 무력화시킬 거야."""

TextEng: <StartAction>Persuade</Start> "Consider it payback for me freeing you."
Text: <StartAction>설득</Start> "널 해방시켜 준 것에 대한 보답이라고 생각해."""

TextEng: "You're annoying me. Time to die." <StartAction>Attack the thralls.</Start>
"You're free. Go now, before the illithid discover you've escaped."
Text: "이제 자유야. 일리시드가 탈출한 걸 발견하기 전에 가."

TextEng: "You disgust me, slaver! You deserve death!" <StartAction>Attack the duergar.</Start>

Text: 날 협박하는 건 누구도 못 해! <StartAction>듀에르가를 공격합니다.</Start>

TextEng: "If you attack me, you're all dead!"
"Where can I get one of those helms?"
<StartAction>Place a black pearl upon the altar.</Start>
<StartAction>Fasten the rope and use it to climb down the pit.</Start>
<StartAction>Empty the deva's blood onto the bones.</Start>
<StartAction>Drive a piece of wood through the creature's heart.</Start>
<StartAction>Place the Nullifier Rod inside the slot.</Start>
"I serve no will but my own."

Text: "네 의견은 네가 알아서 간직해, 이상한 놈아."

TextEng: "Sorry, I don't intend to part with them."
"If it is Vix'thra's wish, they are his."
"Why is he so interested in bones?"
"You're scared of the priests, aren't you."
"This town has some odd folk, doesn't it..."
"What kind of bone creatures did the drow have?"
Text: "드로우가 가지고 있던 뼈 생명체들은 어떤 거였어?"

TextEng: "This town's built of former slaves, then?"
"What can you tell me about the priests?"
"The people here are scared of names?"
"You're not very good at... marketing, are you..."
Text: "넌 장사에 그다지 소질이... 없는 것 같네..."

TextEng: "Why are the villagers afraid of you?"
"If I cannot enter, how may I worship Vix'thra?"
"I wish to speak with your leader."
"I want to ask you some questions."
"Do you know anything about a drow matron called the Valsharess?"
Text: 발샤레스라는 드로우 대모에 대해 아는 거 있어?

TextEng: "What can you tell me about this island?"
Text: 이 섬에 대해 뭘 알려줄 수 있어?

TextEng: <StartAction>Convince the rat to show you the hidden secrets.</Start>
Aghaaz has no claim over any of us! Why do you follow him?
Text: 아가즈는 우리 누구에게도 권한이 없어! 왜 따르는 거야?

TextEng: The Maker is dead! Aghaaz rules only for Aghaaz. We will never bow down to him!
Text: 제작자는 죽었어! 아가즈는 자기 자신만을 위해 지배해. 우린 절대 복종 안 해!

TextEng: "Step aside, if you know what's good for you."
<StartAction>Persuade: Bluff</Start> "Aghaaz said it's okay for me to go in."
"You can't stop me if you're dead!" <StartAction>Attack the golem.</Start>
<StartAction>Convince the rat to move the lever.</Start>
"Sorry - no peace. But I'll turn you into pieces!" <StartAction>Attack</Start>
Text: 미안한데, 평화는 없어. 대신 조각조각 내줄게! <StartAction>공격합니다.</Start>

TextEng: "How do I know this isn't a trick?"
"I don't parlay with golems - I smash them!" <StartAction>Attack</Start>
Text: 골렘이랑 협상 안 해. 부숴버릴 뿐이지! <StartAction>공격합니다.</Start>

TextEng: "A peace? What are you talking about?"
"How do I know this isn't a trick?"
"I know the word of passage: dragisla."
"You abandoned the golems to become a demi-lich?"
"What happens when you finish this perfect golem?"
"But your golems have evolved since you came down here."
Text: "하지만 네가 여기 온 이후 골렘들은 진화했어."

TextEng: "I believe you have mistaken me for someone else."
Text: 날 다른 사람으로 착각한 것 같은데.

TextEng: "How do you know so much about me?"
<StartCheck>[Bluff]</Start> "I am not who you are looking for..."
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "I am sure we can come into some kind of an agreement..."
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 뭔가 합의점을 찾을 수 있을 것 같은데...

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> "Return to the hole in the ground you came from if you wish to live, drow!"
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> 살고 싶으면 네가 나온 구멍으로 돌아가, 드로우!

TextEng: <StartAction>[Randomly touch a few of the symbols]</Start>
<StartCheck>[Lore]</Start> Try to decipher the meaning of the symbols.
<StartCheck>[Spellcraft]</Start> Try to decipher the meaning of the symbols.
<StartAction>[Touch the symbols in the order of the Stone Skin spell]</Start>
<StartAction>[Touch the symbols in the order of the Sound Burst spell]</Start>
<StartAction>[Touch the symbols in the order of the Knock spell]</Start>
<StartAction>[Touch the symbols in the order of the Healing Circle spell]</Start>
<StartAction>[Touch the symbols in the order of the Lightning Bolt spell]</Start>
"Sorry. I only fight to the death!" <StartAction>Attack the apprentice.</Start>
Text: 미안해. 난 죽을 때까지만 싸워! <StartAction>견습생을 공격한다.</Start>

TextEng: "Don't worry. I don't kill those who surrender to me."
"I've given it some thought, and I've decided you have to die!" <StartAction>Attack the apprentice.</Start>
"You better come up with a better reward if you want to live!"
"I'll let you live if you answer some questions."
"I want to ask you some questions."
"How did a town of winged elves end up in the Underdark?"
Text: "날개달린 엘프 마을이 어떻게 언더다크에 있게 된 거야?"

TextEng: "What can you tell me about the castle?"
"How did you get that mirror shard you gave me?"
Text: "내게 준 거울 파편은 어떻게 구한 거야?"

TextEng: "Give me one reason I should let you live."
"You said your invulnerability is gone? Time to die!" <StartAction>Attack the Queen.</Start>
"So is there some reward for helping you?"
Text: 도와준 것에 대한 보상 같은 건 없어?

TextEng: "What about the fool? What happens to him now?"
Text: 바보는 어떻게 돼? 이제 어떻게 되는 거야?

TextEng: "That's it? You're just going to leave him like that?"
Text: 그게 다야? 그냥 저 상태로 놔둘 거야?

TextEng: "It was a pleasure to help you, my lady."
"Your apprentice gave me the shard from the magic mirror."
"I've got no further use for you. Time to die." <StartAction>Attack.</Start>
Text: 너한테 더 이상 쓸모가 없어. 죽을 시간이야. <StartAction>공격한다.</Start>

TextEng: "What can you tell me about the tower?"
"Does your apprentice still have this mirror shard?"
Text: "네 견습생이 아직 이 거울 파편을 갖고 있어?"

TextEng: "Why did you give up on magic?"
"I'm looking for pieces of a broken mirror."
"Former archmage? What do you mean by that?"
"How can you just throw away your entire life's work?"
Text: "어떻게 평생의 업적을 그냥 버릴 수 있어?"

TextEng: "I thought you were bound to do her bidding?"
Text: 여왕의 명령에 복종해야 하는 거 아니야?

TextEng: "You mean... the Relic of the Reaper?"
"There is no way you could have planned this!"
"Then I must send you back to the hell from which you came."
"You have advice for me, I suppose?"
"If you have something to say, be quick!"
"I don't know... you might be right..."
"Very well. You have yourself a deal."
"I don't know. I'd have to think about it."
"I'm not listening to anything you have to say, devil!"
"Forget it. I don't trust you any more than her."
Text: "관둬. 그녀보다 널 더 믿을 수 없어."

TextEng: "Doesn't she have you bound? How is it that you have a choice in this?"
Text: "그녀가 너를 묶어두지 않았어? 어떻게 선택권이 있는 거야?"

TextEng: "I will believe the Valsharess until she gives me reason not to."
Text: "발샤레스를 믿지 못할 이유가 생기기 전까지는 믿을 거야."

TextEng: "You think I will listen to a devil's lies? Hah!"
"You wish to discuss an alliance again?"
Text: 다시 동맹에 대해 논의하고 싶은 거야?

TextEng: "The rebels are winning, drow. Your time is done."
Text: 반군이 이기고 있어, 드로우. 네 시대는 끝났어.

TextEng: "You are a fool to bring me close enough to kill you."
Text: 날 죽일 수 있을 만큼 가까이 오다니 바보로군.

TextEng: "Where am I?! How did I get here?!"
Text: 여기가 어디야?! 어떻게 여기 온 거야?!

TextEng: "It is not too late for us to negotiate."
"You're the fool now. Time for you to die."
"You owe me, Valsharess. I kept my side of the bargain."
Text: 빚을 갚아야지, 발샤레스. 내 몫은 다 했어.

TextEng: "And what's to stop me from killing you now?"
Text: 지금 당장 널 죽이지 못할 이유가 뭐야?

TextEng: "And who is this devil you have here?"
"I am more interested in the power and wealth you offered."
Text: 난 네가 제안한 힘과 부에 더 관심 있어.

TextEng: "Is that what I am to be, as well? A hound on a leash?"
Text: 나도 그렇게 될 거야? 줄에 묶인 사냥개처럼?

TextEng: "And how did you bind such a powerful being?"
Text: 그렇게 강력한 존재를 어떻게 묶어둔 거야?

TextEng: "So I see. What do you propose we do now?"
"Why did you really bring me here?"
"Nothing at all. Just a friendly chat."
"I don't like the tone of your voice."
Text: 네 목소리 톤이 마음에 안 드는데.

TextEng: "Your archdevil is trying to betray you, that's what's happening."
"Wait! This isn't what it looks like...!"
"We've decided we don't need you, drow."
Text: 우린 네가 필요 없다고 결정했어, 드로우.

TextEng: "It just seems you don't command your archdevil like you thought."
Text: 네 대마귀를 생각만큼 통제하지 못하는 것 같은데.
